Statute.Title: Budget Implementation Act, 2023, No. 1
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution du budget de 2023, Loi no 1 d’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2023, c. 26 in force on assent 22.06.2023, except,

Item.Text: — ss. 5(2) and (3) deemed in force 01.01.2017 see s. 5(5)
— s. 8(1) deemed in force 23.06.2013 see s. 8(6)
See also various application provisions throughout.
— s. 11(1) deemed in force 14.12.2012 see s. 11(3)
— s. 11(2) deemed in force 01.04.2023 see s. 11(4)
— ss. 16(1) and (2) deemed in force 01.01.2018 see s. 16(5)
— s. 16(3) deemed in force 01.01.2021 see s. 16(6)
— ss. 19(1) to (3), (5) and (6) deemed in force 01.01.2022 see s. 19(7)
— s. 19(4) deemed in force 01.01.2022 see s. 19(8)
[Note: but if conditions at s. 19(8) are met, s. 93.3 deemed in force 01.01.2006 see s. 19(8)]
— s. 25(1) deemed in force 09.09.2022 see s. 25(2)
— s. 36(1) deemed in force 27.02.2018 see s. 36(2)
— s. 37(1) deemed in force 01.01.2021 see s. 37(2)
— s. 38(1) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 39(2)
— ss. 39(1) to (3) deemed in force 28.03.2023 see s. 39(4)
— s. 40(1) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 40(3)
— ss. 41(1) to (3) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 41(4)
— s. 42(3) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 42(4)
— s. 43(1) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 43(5)
— s. 43(2) deemed in force 01.01.2020 see s. 43(6)
— ss. 43(3) and (4) deemed in force 01.01.2021 see s. 43(7)
— ss. 44(1) and (2) deemed in force 01.01.2021 see s. 44(3)
— ss. 45(1) and (3) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 45(4)
— s. 46(2) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 46(4)
— s. 47(2) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see par. 47(4)
— s. 57(2) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 57(4)
— s. 59(1) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 59(4)
— s. 60(1) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 60(4)
— ss. 75(1) and (2) deemed in force 09.08.2022 see s. 75(3)
— s. 79(2) deemed in force 09.01.2017 see s. 79(2)
— s. 114 deemed in force 05.02.2022 see s. 114(4)
— s. 118(1) deemed in force 05.02.2022 and see also the exception s. 118(2)
— s. 119(1) deemed in force 10.08.2022 see s. 119(2)
— s. 120(1) deemed in force 10.08.2022 see s. 120(2)
— ss. 121(1) to (3) deemed in force 10.08.2022 see s. 121(5)
— s. 122(1) deemed in force 10.08.2022 see s. 122(2)
— s. 124(1) deemed in force 01.04.2023 see s. 124(2)
— s. 125(1) deemed in force 01.04.2023 see s. 125(2)
— s. 126(1) deemed in force 01.04.2023 see s. 126(2)
— ss. 148 to 158 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 180(1) — Not in force
— ss. 159 to 178 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 180(2) — Not in force
— ss. 164, 165 and 170 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 208(2) — Not in force
— ss. 211 to 220 in force on the 90th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent, see s. 228 (19.09.2023)
— ss. 221 and 222 in force on the 90th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 228 (19.09.2023)
— ss. 223 and 224 in force on the 90th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 228 (19.09.2023)
— ss. 225 to 227 in force on the 90th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 228 (19.09.2023)
— s. 235 deemed in force 08.10.2022 see s. 236 and SOR/2022-209
— s. 239 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 241(1) — Not in force
— s. 240 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 241(1) — Not in force
— ss. 1 to 29, 34 and 35 of the Canada Innovation Corporation Act come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see ss. 241(1)— Not in force
— ss. 30 to 33 of the Canada Innovation Corporation Act come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see ss. 241(2) — Not in force
— s. 242 deemed never in force and repealed see s. 242.1
— s. 284(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 285 — Not in force
— ss. 300, 302(1) and (2) and s. 303 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 306 — Not in force

— ss. 364 and 385 to 388, ss. 389(2) and (3), ss. 390 to 393, 396 to 398 and 401 and ss. 402(2), 404(2), 405(2) and 412(3) come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council — Not in force
— s. 430 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must not be before the day referred to in subsection 435(2) see s. 435(1) — Not in force
— s. 431 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 435(2) — Not in force
— ss. 443 and 445 in force 20.09.2023 see s. 451
— ss. 457, 460 to 464 and ss. 465(1), (2) and (4) come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 451(2) — Not in force
— ss. 475 to 478 come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 480 — Not in force
— s. 479 comes into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 480 — Not in force
— ss. 487 to 498 in force 01.01.2025 see s. 499
— s. 501(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 504(1) — Not in force
— s. 502(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 504(2) — Not in force

— ss. 505 and 506 in force on the day that, in the sixth month after the month in which this Act receives royal assent, has the same calendar number as the day on which this Act receives royal assent or, if that sixth month has no day with that number, the last day of that sixth month see s. 507 (22.12.2023)
— s. 515 deemed in force on 15.12.2022 see s. 516
— ss. 610 to 612 come into force 01.01.2025 see SI/2024-25
— ss. 626(2) and 628 in force on 30.04.2024 see s. 630
— ss. 634 and 643 to 645, ss. 647(2), 649(1) and 651(1), ss. 652 and 653, ss. 655(1) and (2) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 679(1) — Not in force

— ss. 635 to 639, 641, 642 and 646, 647(1), 648, 649(2), 650, 651(2) and 655(3) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must be after the day fixed under subsection 679(1) see s. 679(2) — Not in force
— s. 656 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 679(1) — Not in force
— ss. 657 to 659 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 679(1) — Not in force
— ss. 660 and 661 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 679(1) — Not in force
— ss. 662 and 663(1) and (3) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 679(1) — Not in force
— ss. 663(2) and (4) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must be after the day fixed under s. 679(1) see s. 679(2) — Not in force
— ss. 668, 671, 673, 675, 676 and 678(1) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 679(1) — Not in force

— ss. 669, 670, 672, 674 and 677 and 678(2) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must be after the day fixed under s. (1) see s. 679(2) — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF 2024, c. 15, ss. 299 and 300 in force on assent 20.06.2024
CIF 2024, c. 17, s. 338(3) in force 20.06.2024 (Coordinating amendment - conditions met 01.01.2025 see SI/2025-4)
